content: noah-marie is a sibling to my previously published pattern melanie here you get a more closed fit above the foot but not that upriding instep a doubled cuff optionally in contrast color with the same stitch count as the foot provides a secure fit without the heel sliding down heel tabs can be fiddly to work and to be honest my second half of the heel tab never looks great despite being a seasoned knitter so this pattern features some short row between cuff and heel flap to raise the back the heel itself features my newly unvented lotus heel flap where you do not need to pick up stitches more short row at the instep provide a crew neckline with a slightly lowered cuff at the front the pattern is written needle neutral so all needle styles can be used dpns one or two circular needles flexi flips etc sizing uses stitch count from 56 to 72 stitches because this pattern is also great for charity it is available for free if you would like to thank me consider purchasing one of my other designs for yourself or for a friend or buy me a ko-fi 1 > \#stefaniebolddesign #sneakersocksnoahmarie this design is also available at lovecrafts 2 follow me on instagram @stefaniebold 3 1 https //ko-fi com/stefaniebold 2 https //www lovecrafts com/de-de/search q=stefanie%20bold 3 https //www instagram com/stefaniebold/
